#summary Methods of communication between members

= Communication Policies =

         a) Formal methods of communication within our team of 3 members will include individual meetings with other team members, as well as weekly or bi-weekly progress meetings to monitor progress. Informal communication can include phone calls or emails. Google Wave can also be an option when communicating with team members.
        
         b) Formal and informal methods of communication within a larger team would be mostly the same.
